snippet.title: 7 Minutes of Celesteia Alpha Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is a video showcasing the current state of the Celesteia Alpha. In this video, I dig myself a hole into the caves below, fly myself out with upgrades to my jetpack, and build a cozy home to celebrate!

Celesteia is a 2D sandbox game developed entirely by myself, with the title screen music composed by my friend Nwago and the textures designed by Danz. The full source code and assets for the Alpha* are open-source, and can be found here: https://github.com/leafal-io/celesteia

"Hey Morgan, this looks very similar to Voidborne."
Yes, that's true. Celesteia was built from the ground up in the MonoGame framework and was initially made a rewrite of what was once Voidborne, but now under a title that isn't taken by another indie game project.

* The game might become closed source during later development phases.
